description: ‘You’re right, he’s dead. What can have happened? Help me roll him over.’  They duly rearranged the corpse, and both stared down into a Eurasian middle-aged male face, frozen into a mask of pure horror.  ‘Well, I wish we hadn’t done that,’ Maddy said. Madagascar Talifero is about to discover some important things aboard the pleasure-cruiser known as the Demeter. She will discover her own resourcefulness in the face of danger, of course, and she will discover attackers from a terrifying race from the mythical hinterlands of the galaxy. Most importantly, though, she is about to discover a woman with no memory who just might be the most amazing person she's ever met...
title: Winterhill: Death on the Demeter
